===Environment setup===

  * When adding components to the main component library you need to setup DIYLC project. Follow [http://code.google.com/p/diy-layout-creator/source/checkout this guide] to learn how to checkout the project from code base.
  * When creating your own component library, setup a Java project and add *diylc.jar* to it's dependencies.
